article_title: Today’s Top Supply Chain and Logistics News From WSJ
article_text:
Sign up: With one click, get this newsletter delivered to your inbox.

CMA CGM SA will buy container shipping line Neptune Orient Lines Ltd. The biggest acquisition in the maritime industry in a generation was announced Monday, the WSJ’s P.R Venkat and Costas Paris report, and it values NOL at $2.4 billion. Including the debt of the Singapore-based company, the overall value of the deal is about $5 billion. Assuming regulators approve the acquisition, the purchase by the world’s No, 3 container line will mark the biggest...

article_summary:
Assuming regulators approve the acquisition, the purchase by the world’s No, 3 container line will mark the biggest...
The biggest acquisition in the maritime industry in a generation was announced Monday, the WSJ’s P.R Venkat and Costas Paris report, and it values NOL at $2.4 billion.
CMA CGM SA will buy container shipping line Neptune Orient Lines Ltd.
Including the debt of the Singapore-based company, the overall value of the deal is about $5 billion.
